data.meta_description: Starting my role as Vice Chancellor of Universiti Islam Antarabangsa Sultan Abdul Halim Mu'adzam Shah (Sultan Abdul Halim Mu'adzam Shah International Islamic… | 132 comments on LinkedIn
data.text: For the first time, Universiti Utara Malaysia (UUM) through its Othman Yeop Abdullah Graduate School of Business (OYAGSB) has been listed in the QS World University Rankings (QSWUR): Global MBA 2021 at the 201+ position which in one fell swoop placed UUM as the 27th best university in Asia. The Vice-Chancellor, Prof. Dato’ Dr. Ahmad Bashawir Abdul Ghani said that UUM's aspiration of positioning OYAGSB as the Top Business School by 2025 has become a reality with its listing in the QSWUR. "Indeed, I am deeply honoured and extremely delighted for OYAGSB's successful listing at the international level which has indirectly given recognition to the graduate school on the world stage. "OYAGSB has its own reputation and quality, therefore I am confident it can elevate the UUM brand to a higher level," he said. QSWUR Assessment: Global MBA 2021 adopts five (5) indicators categorized into five main categories namely Employability, Return on Investment, Entrepreneurship & Alumni Outcomes, Thought Leadership and Class & Faculty Diversity. #mba #uum
